# f-ACME-001: User Login

> **Product:** ACME Shop  
> **Status:** Active

## Purpose
Allow users to authenticate.

## Scope
- Login with email/password

## In Scope
- Standard credential validation

## Actors
- End User

## Main Flow
1. User enters credentials
2. System validates
3. User is logged in

## Business Rules
- Password min 8 chars

## Edge Cases
- Invalid credentials show error

## Non-Goals
- OAuth (future)
